name: C. Leha and Function
statement:
Leha like all kinds of strange things. Recently he liked the function .
Consider all possible -element subsets of the set . For subset find
minimal element in it. mathematical expectation of the minimal element
among all -element subsets.But only function does not interest him. He
wants to do interesting things with it. Mom brought him two arrays and ,
each consists of integers. For all such that the condition holds. Help
Leha rearrange the numbers in the array so that the sum is maximally
possible, where is already rearranged array.
